LanguageData.VFEM_HeavyCrossbow.label: heavy crossbow
LanguageData.VFEM_HeavyCrossbow.description: Construct heavy crossbows, capable of firing a projectile unstoppable by most man-made armors.
LanguageData.VFEM_NobleMedievalApparel.label: medieval noble apparel
LanguageData.VFEM_NobleMedievalApparel.description: Make noble apparel that brings a certain degree of authority to the wearer.
LanguageData.VFEM_PlagueMask.label: plague mask
LanguageData.VFEM_PlagueMask.description: Make masks filled with herbal medicine to prevent wearers from catching plague and spreading the black plague.
LanguageData.VFEM_TreeHealroot.label: healroot tree
LanguageData.VFEM_TreeHealroot.description: Grow healroot trees that yield medicine and emit antispetic smell.
LanguageData.VFEM_MeatSmoking.label: meat smoking
LanguageData.VFEM_MeatSmoking.description: Smoke meat to preserve it for a long amount of time.
